featured.text: With their plan 12 by the rain, the two dozen participants squeezed into the living room.
By the time Moran died, he had painted a dozen other areas that would become national parks or monuments.

definition.en_def: A group or set of twelve items.
definition.example: I bought a dozen eggs from the store.
